Description:
The Social Media Content Creator is responsible for creating engaging and visually appealing content for our social media channels, including TikTok, Reels, IG Stories, and FB Ads. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of current social media trends and be able to create content that resonates with our target audience.Responsibilities:Research and develop content ideas that align with our brand and marketing goals
Create high-quality videos, images, and text content for social media
Edit and optimize content for social media platforms
Collaborate with the Social Media Content Manager to create and execute a content calendar
Track and measure the performance of social media content
Stay up-to-date on social media trends and best practicesSkills
Skills:
2+ years of experience in social media content creation
Strong understanding of social media platforms and trends
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Creative and innovative thinker
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
